title: A beginner's guide to AI for Boomers, from technology writer Jonathan Margolis
description: Artificial intelligence advice for beginners, by veteran technology writer Jonathan Margolis, 70
content: For the past three years, since AI became available free (more or less) to everyone with a phone or a computer, it’s been hard to go an hour without it being mentioned in the news or everyday conversation. AI has been the fastest-developing technolog... [5780 chars]

title: A 9-point checklist to improve AI-based image analysis in pathology
description: A new article in Veterinary Pathology introduces a 9-point checklist designed to improve the reporting quality of studies that use artificial intelligence (AI)-based automated image analysis (AIA). As AI tools become more widely used in pathology-based research, concerns have emerged about the reproducibility and transparency of published findings.
content: A new article in Veterinary Pathology introduces a 9-point checklist designed to improve the reporting quality of studies that use artificial intelligence (AI)-based automated image analysis (AIA). As AI tools become more widely used in pathology-bas... [999 chars]

title: Goa Champions Digital Revolution: Unveiling AI-Driven Governance
description: Goa is embracing a digital transformation by leveraging artificial intelligence and emerging technologies to foster inclusive and citizen-centric governance. Under the Goa AI Mission 2027, the state is building a future-ready environment aimed at enhancing efficiency through creativity and inclusivity within the governance framework.
content:
Goa is leading a digital transformation in India by using artificial intelligence and emerging technologies to foster more inclusive and citizen-focused governance, announced state Minister Rohan Khaunte.

title: OpenAI To Set Up First India Office This Year; CEO Altman To Visit Next Month
description: According to OpenAI, the establishment of the India office reflects its support for the IndiaAI Mission and commitment to partnering with the government to build Artificial Intelligence (AI) for India, with India
content: New Delhi: OpenAI on Friday said it will set up its first India office in New Delhi later this year, as its high-profile founder Sam Altman announced his plans to visit the country next month.In a post on X, Altman said AI adoption in India has been ... [5278 chars]

content:

title: Putin Sees Hope in Russia-US Relations Amid Arctic Cooperation Talks
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin expressed optimism about improving Russia-US relations, citing potential cooperation in the Arctic and Alaska. Despite historically low ties, Putin praised the diplomatic efforts under President Trump. The collaboration touches on Arctic projects and the development of Artificial Intelligence technologies.
content:
Russian President Vladimir Putin on Friday signaled optimism about the future of Russia-US relations, as discussions on joint projects in the Arctic and Alaska provide a beacon of hope.

title: Meta freezes AI hiring, even as boom continues
description: Meta halted all hiring for its artificial intelligence division, reportedly even pausing movement between teams within the company.
content: The Meta logo marks the entrance of its corporate headquarters in Menlo Park, Calif., on Nov. 9, 2022. Facebook owner Meta plans to lay off more than 11,000 of its staff in “the most difficult changes we’ve made in Meta’s history,” CEO Mark Zuckerber... [2191 chars]

title: Home Depot Hit with Lawsuit Over Allegations About Using Facial Recognition Technology
description: The lawsuit, filed in an Illinois court on Friday, Aug. 1, alleges the company uses a form of artificial intelligence called “computer vision” to help mitigate theft by collecting data about customers’ facial geometry in violation of the state's Biometric Information Privacy Act
content:
NEED TO KNOW The Home Depot is facing a class action lawsuit regarding allegations about implementing facial recognition technology in its stores
